item.title: terraform安装与命令详解
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: 安装Terraform Mac系统安装 Copy 1 2 brew tap hashicorp/tap brew install hashicorp/tap/terraform Linux系统安装 ubuntu安装 Copy 1 2 3 curl -fsSL https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-add-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com $(lsb_release -cs) main" sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get

item.title: 自动化编排工具Terraform介绍
